headline: Slow Cooker Chicken Marrakesh
name: Slow Cooker Chicken Marrakesh
description: This hearty chicken Marrakesh stew features chicken, sweet potatoes, garbanzo beans, tomatoes, and spices that simmer to perfection in the slow cooker.
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 2-inch pieces
2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, sweet potatoes, garbanzo beans, carrots, onion, and garlic into a slow cooker.
Mix parsley, salt, cumin, turmeric, cinnamon, and pepper together in a small bowl. Sprinkle over chicken and vegetables, then pour in tomatoes and stir to combine.
Cover and cook on High until sweet potatoes are tender and sauce has thickened, 4 to 5 hours.
